name: Clarifai
description: Clarifai offers a leading AI platform that helps developers and businesses build AI-powered applications. Their platform specializes in computer vision, natural language processing, and audio recognition, enabling users to manage unstructured image, video, text, and audio data.

name: Dataiku
description: Dataiku provides an end-to-end, collaborative data science platform that enables companies to build, deploy, and manage AI and analytics applications. It is designed for a wide range of users, from data scientists to business analysts, to foster a data-driven culture.
